title: Near and Far Away
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 36 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: This simple leveled reader uses students' favorite subject--animals--to illustrate a crucial spatial relationship. Each animal is shown close-up and then farther away in its natural habitat. The simple, patterned text and beautiful photographs ensure that this book educates while it entertains.
meta: deer, far, lion, near, owl, wolf
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand text
Consonants : Identify words that start with Ff

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
